attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That the Scotland Gas Networks be compelled to respect the rights of owners when digging holes on their property, for non emergency operations.
That the owners of the area being dug up, be consulted and the least restrictive area be used rather than the arrogant "we have rights" statement by the gas Networks
That the Rights of the owners be Acknowledged and respected.
